Package org.lwjgl.system.linux

Contains bindings to native APIs specific to the Linux operating system.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicLinkLoader
    Native bindings to .
    LinuxLibrary
    Implements a SharedLibrary on the Linux OS.
    Visual
    Visual structure; contains information about colormapping possible.
    Visual.Buffer
    An array of Visual structs.
    X11
    Native bindings to libX11.
    X11.Functions
    Contains the function pointers loaded from the X11 SharedLibrary.
    XSetWindowAttributes
    Data structure for setting window attributes.
    XSetWindowAttributes.Buffer
    An array of XSetWindowAttributes structs.
    XVisualInfo
    Information used by the visual utility routines to find desired visual type from the many visuals a display may support.
    XVisualInfo.Buffer
    An array of XVisualInfo structs.

Package org.lwjgl.system.linux Description

Contains bindings to native APIs specific to the Linux operating system.
